DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of potential ticagrelor effects on dabigatran exposure and evaluation of two new pharmacodynamic methods
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Pharmacodynamic Effects of Dabigatran and Ticagrelor and Assessment of Ticagrelor Interaction Potential With Dabigatran
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 2. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
